Html:
I've read about a gallery control and a listbox control coming to the ribbon, but I don't see them...  Do you know (roughly) when they'll be out?  I'd really like to use them in my current app, particularly the listbox... I know I could retemplate a dropdown button or something but if you have a good control coming out in the near future I'd prefer that.  Thanks for any help!

 

Josh
